title: Alpha testers change to Beta tester?
body:
With Alpha client coming to an end, do alpha testers automatically become beta testers?Or do they get a choice if they want to or not? Or is put back at random of the so many applicants applying to be testers? Thank you in advance for your feedback!

 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Once the beta starts, there will be no more alpha. Everyone will be able to join the beta without requesting access.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot a huevo,realm=NA,application-id=2E4zVIwd,discussion-id=IefAMr24,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-21T04:03:50.995+0000)
>
> Once the beta starts, there will be no more alpha. Everyone will be able to join the beta without requesting access.

So you are saying that any player can play beta once alpha comes to an end? With out anything needed but an update of sorts?

Yeah, that is correct. Actually, every single user will be prompted to update their client during the open beta. Performing the update will be optional. Once the beta comes to an end, doing the update will no longer be optional.
